title: Leauge Of Legends Movie
body:
Hello everyone. 

I was really wondering why Riot doesnt make a full LoL movie ? They really do some amazing champion trailers on time to time and they clearly have the budget for it.  I would really like to see the story of league of legends in a couple of movie series.

They have more than enought tools for it so why not ?:D 
We've all seen some really good trailers from Riot ,  is the Varus trailer which is really amazing. Perfect graphics perfect story.

Yeah that isn't really the problem.

The main problem is that, they aren't a movie company.

They've addressed this. Besides the fact they would need to find an actual movie studio/company to make it for them, video game movies haven't done well and they are a new kind of movie that isn't well established as a genre.

Riot doesn't make those cinematics. They're outsourced to a variety of production companies.
